subject: Suits and Litigation (Civil)
Sex Crimes
Colleges and Universities
Child Abuse and Neglect
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: The federal judge Yvette Kane gave the N.C.A.A. and Pennsylvania officials a month to try to work out a possible settlement of a lawsuit over the penalties Penn State is paying for mishandling the Jerry Sandusky child molestation scandal.
snippet: The federal judge Yvette Kane gave the N.C.A.A. and Pennsylvania officials a month to try to work out a possible settlement of a lawsuit over the penalties Penn State is paying for mishandling the Jerry Sandusky child molestation scandal.
